government to take action by setting a realistic maxiumn price for school unoforms of under £100 including pe kit
There is no reason that parents already hard pressed to make ends meet should be subject to over inflated prices subsiding school budgets
£5 to £10 an item is more than enough not the inflated prices being charged £23.50 for a pair of school trousers is a joke as is £20 for a jumper
